name: _THEKILLER
description:
A game made for Juice GameJam ||. 

!!! MUSIC IS NOT MINE, I DOWNLOADED IT FROM YOUTUBE AND I WON'T USE IT FOR COMMERCIAL PURPOSE !!!

MUSIC USED:

Street Cleaner - Murdercycle

Visitor - RnB

Main features:

-You can kill

-A lot of particles, glow & camera shakes

-Satisfying sound & gameplay

-Open new guns & maps

-Discover new upgrades & enemies

This game was done in a week, it doesn't have much content, but maybe i will continue working on it.
